posts.post_title: WTB - T206 HOF Portraits - Chesbro, Joss, Mcgraw (no cap)
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for lower grade (SGC 30/PSA 2) T206 HOF portraits of Jack Chesbro, Addie Joss and John McGraw (no cap). Please PM me if you have any of these 3 available.

Thanks for looking,

Steve
